name: STARLINE RESCUE SQUAD
description:
Starline Rescue Squad (LD50)

By @TigerJ and @gingerjams206

Ludum Dare We party too much!  Our party ship blew up!  Nothing left to do but party! We have 90 days to survive.  Help us keep the party going! W - thrust forward S - thrust backward A/D - Steer Collect fuel/med kits/nanna fries Push W to start
